description: Pylint warning baseline for PR regression detection

E0401.reason: Disabled in pyproject.toml - container environment false positives

E0611.reason: Disabled in pyproject.toml - container environment false positives

E1101.reason: Disabled in pyproject.toml - dynamic attribute false positives

I1101.reason: Disabled in pyproject.toml - false positives from C extensions

C0302.reason: Disabled in pyproject.toml - large modules are intentional

C0413.reason: Disabled in pyproject.toml - intentional pattern for sys.path modifications

C0415.reason: Disabled in pyproject.toml - intentional lazy loading pattern

W0603.reason: Disabled in pyproject.toml - intentional singleton pattern

W0718.reason: Disabled in pyproject.toml - intentional error boundary pattern

C0103.reason: Disabled in pyproject.toml - script names, constants, statistical variables

R0904.reason: Fixed via inline disable on test classes with comprehensive coverage

W0511.reason: Tracked to prevent adding more TODOs - remaining 11 are valid future work items

notes: tracked_only=true: Only fail on regressions in tracked categories
Tracked categories are patterns we intentionally disabled in pyproject.toml
Other pylint warnings are reported as suggestions but don't fail the check
To add new tracked categories, add them here AND handle in pyproject.toml
Run './automation/ci-cd/run-lint-stage.sh full' to verify current state
